00072 
00073 // Linux support.
00074 #ifdef LINUX
00075 
00076 /* SHUT_WR is apparently not defined in RH Linux 6.x. */
00077 #ifndef SHUT_WR
00078 #define SHUT_WR 1
00079 #endif
00080 
00081 /* Compatibility with the Windows definitions. */
00082 #ifndef SOCKET
00083 #define SOCKET int
00084 #define INVSOC (-1)
00085 #define INVALID_SOCKET INVSOC
00086 #define SOCKET_ERROR (-1)
00087 #define SD_SEND SHUT_WR
00088 #define closesocket close
00089 #endif
00090 
00091 #endif

00115

00117         static bool portInUse(int port);
